Author: mangerinez
Text: Thank you so much ♥️ this kind of stuff really get to me, i’ve been restricting for a while now and trying really hard not to eat anything that isn’t “safe” or that i know that calories of and this just made me feel shitty, but the thing is that sOmEhOw today I weight 1kg more than i did yesterday. how is this even possible?? Because I don’t *think* it’s water weight, i don’t even know how i’d know whether it is or not, so i think this is why i’m panicking over that cake :’))

Author: fragilmountain
Text: hi bb, i know how you’re feeling right now and it’s ok! whenever we believe we have “lost control” it’s always panic inducing. BUT! it’s two slices of cake. and i’m assuming they were pretty delicious. i’m hoping you got to at least savor the taste of them. there is no way two cake slices will lead to any actual weight gain. just remember, in order to gain TRUE weight (i say true bc the scale could go up but that’s water weight/the literal weight of the food in you) you’d have to eat 3500 calories plus your tdee! everything will be perfectly okay 🖤
